oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WNOX All Star Jamboree
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WNOX All Star Jamboree broadside for broadcast at Etowah Junior High School, July 11 (no year). Lists names of performers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Ephemera; Radio broadcasting; Musicians;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WNOX ALL STAR JAMBOREE BROADCAST DIRECT FROM STAGE Smiling Eddie And All Of The Mountain Boys CLAUDE BOONE America's Sensational Hill Billy DEW DROP You've heard from XERA and XEAW, way down in Mexico AYTCHIE BURNS Dixie's Fastest Slapper Of The Bass MARION SUMNER Tri-State Fiddling Champion ADDED ATTRACTION- Chas. Hagerman SNOWBALL THE BOY WITH THE TALKING FEET Smiling Eddie Hill MASTER OF CEREMONIES APPEARING AT Etowah Junior High School SATURDAY -JULY 11 Proceeds to be used for Children's Playground 8 P. M. - Adm. under 14, 13c Fed. Tax 2c - Adults 32c Fed. Tax 3c
